Header: Suranga Ranaweera wins 1st phase of Air Force anniversary cycle tour
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Suranga Ranaweera from the Dehiwala Mount Lavinia Municipal Council won the 1st phase of the Air Force cycle tour. The cycle tour was held to commemorate the 68th anniversary of the Sri Lanka Air Force. The event was flagged off from the Air Force headquarters. Air Force commander Air Vice Marshal Kapila Jayampathi, and Group Director of The Capital Maharaja Organization Chevaan Daniel attended the event. The media sponsor of the event is MTV and MBC . One hundred and forty-eightÂ (148) participants took part in the first phase of the event that extended along 114km route from Colombo to Kandy. Suranga Ranaweera from the Dehiwala Mount Lavinia Municipal Council was placed 1st while Pathum Sampath from the Sri Lanka Army was placed second. Shenal Chamod from the Ports Authority was placed third.
